§ 1311. Authority of President to obtain release For the use or benefit of the Federal Government, the President may obtain from an individual or officer to whom land has been or will be conveyed a release of the individual’s or officer’s interest to the Government. (Pub. L. 107–217, Aug. 21, 2002, 116 Stat. 1138.)
